summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4395 for the improvement of 45th Avenue South, from Dawson Street to the south line of Columbia Heights 2nd Addition, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 51991, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
